Class CudaDataBufferFactory

    public class CudaDataBufferFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataBufferFactory
    Creates cuda buffers

        public DataBuffer create(DataBuffer underlyingBuffer,
                         long offset,
                         long length)
        Description copied from interface: DataBufferFactory
        Create a databuffer wrapping another one this allows you to create a view of a buffer with a different offset and length backed by the same storage
        Specified by:
        create in interface DataBufferFactory
        Parameters:
        underlyingBuffer - the underlying buffer to get the storage from
        offset - the offset to view the data as
        length - the length of the buffer
        Returns:
        the databuffer as a view

      • create

        public DataBuffer create(org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer pointer,
                         DataBuffer.Type type,
                         long length,
                         org.bytedeco.javacpp.indexer.Indexer indexer)
        Create a data buffer based on the given pointer, data buffer type, and length of the buffer
        Specified by:
        create in interface DataBufferFactory
        Parameters:
        pointer - the pointer to use
        type - the type of buffer
        length - the length of the buffer
        indexer -
        Returns:
        the data buffer backed by this pointer with the given type and length.
